nodes.text: Uyohn was a male engineer who served in the Galactic Republic's Futures Program on Brentaal before being hand picked by Director Orson Krennic to join Galen Erso's kyber crystal research team. In 0 BBY, Krennic traveled to the Eadu Energy Conversion Laboratory on Eadu where the team were based after learning of Erso's betrayal. After the team had lined up in front of him, Krennic noted that Uyohn stood straight-backed expressing emotions between fear and deluded, desperate hope.
While on Eadu, Uyohn wore a blue-and-white engineering jumpsuit.
Uyohn, albeit unidentified, first appeared in the film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. He was first identified in the novelization which was written by Alexander Freed.
